attributes.action: allow Child Support Benefit to be paid for British Children of parents living abroad in a country where it is illegal for them to work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Current laws do not allow British citizens from claiming child benefit for a British Child when they are abroad.  

This, coupled with the UK immigration requirement that foreign nationals married to British Citizens must be able to live without access to public funds including Child Support, causes families to split up, often for long periods of time in order for the parent to support their children.  This can seriously effect the child-parent relationship and the child's English Language development.

Please support this petition so British Children with caring families do not have to live in poverty.

If any Charitable Organizations would like to support my family please contact me at 

stuart.k.r.anderson@gmail.com

This petition is only for one month due to the urgency of the situation.

rejection.details: Please remove the email address on your petition.
